long_description: Combining good looks with great value, the Guster Kayak from Emotion Kayaks offers a blend of stability, control and comfort that's perfectly suited to beginning paddlers on calm waters. Concave, V-shape hull is designed to cut through the water and offers remarkable stability on flatwater and light, rolling waves. Polyethylene hull resists abrasion and UV light; specialized molding process produces a strong hull of consistent quality. Large cockpit opening makes it easy to get into the boat with some extra gear, and small ditty tray keeps track of small items within easy reach. Fore and aft deck rigging keeps essential gear within easy reach; paddle holder secures paddle on either side of cockpit when you need both hands. Built-in foam blocks add flotation. Foam seat and backrest; adjustable footbraces; large, comfortable handles. The Emotion Kayaks Guster Kayak weights 48 lb.
short_description: Combining good looks with great value, the Guster Kayak from Emotion Kayaks offers a blend of stability, control and comfort that's perfectly suited to beginning paddlers on calm waters.
